title: View Local Branches
description: In Git, branches are used to develop features or isolate changes made to the codebase. Local branches are the branches that exist only on your local machine. In this challenge, you will learn how to view a list of all local branches in a Git repository.

meta.title: View Local Branches in Git: A Hands-on Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to view a list of all local branches in a Git repository through this interactive challenge.
meta.keywords: git repository, version control, git labs, git commands, git, local branches, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful view
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 查看本地分支
i18n.description: 在 Git 中，分支用于开发功能或隔离对代码库所做的更改。本地分支是仅存在于你本地机器上的分支。在这个挑战中，你将学习如何查看 Git 仓库中所有本地分支的列表。

meta.title: 在 Git 中查看本地分支：实践挑战
meta.description: 通过这个互动挑战，学习如何查看 Git 仓库中所有本地分支的列表。
meta.keywords: git 仓库、版本控制、git 实验室、git 命令、git、本地分支、git 游乐场

verify.name: 验证是否成功查看
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
